content:
JIN YU
3361 Cardinal Drive, Niagara Falls, ON L2H 3A6
(905) 341-2031 | [seijinyu@gmail.com](mailto:seijinyu@gmail.com)

WORK EXPERIENCE
Barista, Starbucks, Lake St.
April 2021 - Present

* Curate drinks/food under high traffic and pressure times
* Practice active safety/cleaning protocols
* Perform early opening/closing duties
* Form personal customer connections

Server, Twisted Vine Kitchen & Market, Virgil
June 2019 - June 2022

* Create a sophisticated and welcoming dining experience
* Effectively take orders and serve guests their meals/drinks
* Perform opening/closing duties of restaurant and bar

Social Media Coordinator, Dog’SPAw, Dunn St. Plaza
December 2019 - Present

* Develop and execute engaging and professional posts/highlights/stories on Instagram
* Marketing for engagement/gaining local popularity
* Respond to direct messages for bookings/extra information

Barista, Starbucks, Skylon Tower
March 2019 - September 2019

* Take orders and make drinks/food in a timely fashion
* Maintain a positive and safe working space under high pressure
* Perform opening/closing duties as well as merchandising

EDUCATION
Toronto Metropolitan University, Toronto
Expected June 2023

* Pursuing Bachelor of Journalism

Brock University, St. Catharines
September 2019 - November 2021

* Completed 2 years towards Bachelor of Business Administration

A.N. Myer High School, Niagara Falls
September 2015 - June 2019

* High School Diploma

SKILLS

* Intermediate speaking level in Korean
* Basic speaking level in French
* Customer service experience
* Thrives under pressure

CERTIFICATIONS

* St. John’s Ambulance CPR
* Grade 8 Royal Conservatory
* Honours and Scholar’s student (90-95+ average)

EXTRACURRICULARS/ VOLUNTEER
LawPlus student

* Network with legal professionals
* Attend seminars on valuable work-life skills
* Work on projects based on real cases given by lawyers

Teaching Assistant, Eden High

* Give short lessons on topics of Law & History (Gr. 10-12)
* Provide 1-on-1 help
* Grade and design lesson plans

English Tutor

* Conduct 1-on-1 sessions on English writing/speaking (SK - Gr. 12)
